titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Caren Prommerserger

address.addressline1: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

creation.date: Text converted and initial EAD encoding provided by Apex CoVantage, April 2005

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.abstract: Fred Cazel was a professor in the History Department at the University of Connecticut from 1948-1988. He was active in many professional and University committees.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Fred Cazel was a professor in the history department at the University of Connecticut from 1948-1988. He was actively involved in the Medieval Studies Program, as well as many organization, including Phi Beta Kappa and the Conference on British Studies. He was an active member of university committees, including presidential search, History Department and various university senate committees. He was president of the Senate Executive Committee for many years.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains notes, correspondence and related materials pertaining to Professor Cazel's interests and activities. The papers focus mainly on the organizations, committees, programs and events with which he was involved and include files on AAUP, the Committee on Curricula and Courses, the Committee of Five to Investigate Charges of Communism, and the New England Historical Association. Also included are some research and teaching materials.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Fred Cazel Papers. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The papers were donated by Professor Cazel to the University of Connecticut Libraries after his retirement in 1988. Additional materials were donated in 2002 and 2003 but have not yet been integrated into the collection.
